name: While you sleep I hunt ghosts with the pope's revolver
name_original: While you sleep I hunt ghosts with the pope's revolver
description:
My 7dfps submission.  When your enemies are invisible ghosts, you can only rely on your ghost-hunting phone, and your (previously the pope's) revolver.

Enjoyed the game? Try the prequel! https://kkcn.itch.io/dick-storm-ghosthunter
